edu.smu.tspell.wordnet
Interface AdverbSynset

All Superinterfaces:
Synset
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdverbReferenceSynset
public interface AdverbSynset
extends Synset

Represents a synset that corresponds to an adverb meaning.

Method Detail

getPertainyms

public WordSense[] getPertainyms(String wordForm)
                          throws WordNetException
Returns the pertainyms (adjectives from which this adverb was derived), if any, associated with a word form in this synset.

For example, a pertainym of "genuinely" is "genuine".

Parameters:
wordForm - Word form for which to return pertainyms.
Returns:
The pertainyms of this synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

getTopics

public NounSynset[] getTopics()
                       throws WordNetException
Identifies the topics with which this synset is associated.

Returns:
Topics / subjects associated with this synset.
Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.

                       throws WordNetException

Throws:
WordNetException - An error occurred retrieving data.
